reviewText: I'm watching it over again. It keeps my sons eyes glued to it and its educational too.
My 6 year old LOVED this video.  It was put together in a fun yet informative way.  Thank you for keeping him entertained and for teaching him a bit of science at the same time.
Bought as part of an educational library.  All the Eyewitness videos are taken out often and very popular with the teachers (and students) who use them.  Also very watchable for the whole family.
